sentences: Ta oli päralt oma ema sõnadele.
Nad ei saanud päralt oma murettekitavatest naabritest.
context: The Estonian word 'päralt' is an adverb that means under control, in charge of, or responsible for. It indicates someone having authority or management over something or someone else. This form appears to be the elative case (indicating movement away from something) combined with a root related to control or possession.
